templates.name: How do I set up a Sactional?
templates.content:
Sactionals require assembly with everything you need included in the boxes and no tools are required. Here are some steps to help you get started:
- Set Seat Cushions on the floor to see if they fit your room in your desired configuration.
- If you are not placing Sactionals on the carpet, put felt pads (included with Seats and Sides) on all Shoes and Feet so you don't scratch the floor.
- Each shoe has a crosshair on top to show you where the feet go.
- U-shaped steel Clamps secure Seats and Sides together.
You can watch this video for a full assembly walk through: https://lovesac.attn.tv/afbXZOM_c24S or check out these How-To PDFs: https://lovesac.attn.tv/aLgAzKLtnU5u

templates.name: How will you ship my Sac?
templates.content: Sac inserts will be shipped in a sturdy nylon duffel, shrunken to approximately 1/8th their full volume. While reusable, these duffels are for shipping purposes and may get dirty in transit. Please note that your Sac Cover will be shipped separately.

templates.name: Do you ship to PO Boxes/APO addresses?
templates.content: I'm afraid we currently don't ship to PO Boxes or APO addresses.

templates.name: Do you ship to Alaska or Hawaii?
templates.content: At this time we do not ship outside of the 48 contiguous States, so we are unable to ship to Alaska, Hawaii, Canada, Mexico, and all other countries or territories.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on all orders within the contiguous United States.

templates.name: How will my Sactional be shipped?
templates.content:
Sactional Seats, Sides, and Covers are shipped in separate boxes, designed to maximize shipping efficiency. Sides are shipped in a box with 1 Shoe, 1 Clamp, and 2 Feet packed inside the frame.

Seats ship with 1 Shoe, 1 Clamp, and 4 Feet, with the Seat cushions and Back Pillows inside the Seat Frame. Wedge Seats ship with 2 L-shaped Shoes, 1 Clamp, and 4 Feet, with the Back Pillow inside the Seat Frame and the Seat cushion outside the frame.
